about_the_game:
The Sounds of Terror is our first Horror inspired Audio Booster pack. The very talented Orpheus returns to bring you this custom made pack of sounds, all GameGuru MAX-ready, and perfect for almost any genre where you want to scare or spook your players!

Included in this pack you'll find over 20 NPC Voices, 16 Loopable Ambient Sounds, 19 Creepy Sounds, Sounds for opening and closing doors and drawers, more than 20 sounds for Ghosts, Ghouls and Demons, 36 'Item" sounds, including rattling chains, splatters, creaking floorboards - and many more. Add to this, a selection of Tannoy announcements, ideal for hospitals, asylums and institutions, plus a collection of useful UI sounds, to add that final element of quality to your games.

Turn up the sound on your games!!
